  • Uses of Coord in controller

    Methods in controller with parameters of type Coord 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void PawnController.move​(Coord direction)
    Will move the controller's pawn into the given direction.
    void PawnController.placeWall​(Coord origin, Coord direction)
    given an coordinate (origin) and a direction (UP or RIGHT), place a wall and register it in the board.

    Methods in engine that return types with arguments of type Coord 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static java.util.Hashtable<Coord,​Coord> Rules.finAPath​(PawnController ctrl)
    It searches a path to the goal row of the controller's dependency starting from it's current coordinates.
    static java.util.Hashtable<Coord,​Coord> Rules.finAPath​(PawnController ctrl)
    It searches a path to the goal row of the controller's dependency starting from it's current coordinates.
    static java.util.ArrayList<Coord> Rules.path​(PawnController ctrl)
    this method translate the exploredTab of findAPath into a list containing the path to follow.
    Methods in engine with parameters of type Coord 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static boolean Rules.canMove​(PawnController ctrl, Coord direction)
    from the controller position, tells if it can move into the given direction.
    static boolean Rules.canMove​(PawnController ctrl, Coord direction, Coord currentCoord)
    does the same as the 2 parameters canMove but it checks from a given coordinates instead of the controller's coordinates.
    static boolean Rules.canPlaceWall​(PawnController[] playerArray, PawnController ctrl, Coord origin, Coord direction)
    is a global verification combining Rules.validPlacement(Coord, Coord, Board) and Rules.pathOrNot(PawnController).
    static boolean Rules.hasWon​(Coord coord, PawnController ctrl)
    checks if the coord full-fill the winning condition.
    static boolean Rules.validPlacement​(Coord coord, Coord direction, Board board)
    This method will check if the wall a controller wants to place does not get Out Of Bounds (OOB), if it does not cut an already placed wall and if it does not stack up on an existing wall.
    Method parameters in engine with type arguments of type Coord 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static int Rules.explore​(java.util.Hashtable<Coord,​Coord> exploredTable, java.util.ArrayList<Coord> exploredCoord, java.util.ArrayList<Coord> toBeExplored, PawnController ctrl)
    part of the breadth-first search, will explore all the surrounding positions and then repeat Each newly discovered position is added at the beginning of the toBeExplored list.
    static int Rules.explore​(java.util.Hashtable<Coord,​Coord> exploredTable, java.util.ArrayList<Coord> exploredCoord, java.util.ArrayList<Coord> toBeExplored, PawnController ctrl)
    part of the breadth-first search, will explore all the surrounding positions and then repeat Each newly discovered position is added at the beginning of the toBeExplored list.

    part of the breadth-first search, will explore all the surrounding positions and then repeat Each newly discovered position is added at the beginning of the toBeExplored list.
